transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Ya Mohit ji Vijay Agarwal bol raha hu IndiaMART se kaise ho aap?
Customer: Sir, mai thik hu.
Executive: Chalo badhiya badhiya. Mai keh raha hu ki ab wo issue hua tha jo aapki subah baat hui thi aapki?
Customer: Are yaar, ek hafte se yahi ho raha hai. Page open nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Mobile se kar rahe ho, kaise kar rahe ho aap?
Customer: Hum to hamesha mobile se hi kar rahe hain.
Executive: Mobile se na isko mobile ko logout kiya aapne?
Customer: Mobile ka load matlab?
Executive: Matlab app ko delete kiya aapne ek baar bhi?
Customer: App ko delete karna hai?
Executive: Ek baar mai line pe hi hu aap speaker pe dalo phone ko. Aap suno meri baat agar app ko delete karenge uske baad dekho kya ho raha hai.
Customer: Agar logout hum karenge na to uske liye setting me jana padta hai.
Executive: Aap ek kaam karo isko uninstall kar do IndiaMART app ko aap, thik hai? Agar aap IndiaMART ke app ko dobara se install karo, apna primary mobile number yahi wala dalo jispe aapka number dala hua hai, OTP aayega, login karo. Fir ek baar dekhoge chala nahi chala sir aapka.
Customer: Thik hai mai mai ek minute thero ek minute thero. Aap line pe rahunga mai.
Executive: Ye ho gaya uninstall ha?
Customer: Ha ab play store pe jao.
Executive: Play store.
Customer: Chala gaya.
Executive: Install karo. Ab IndiaMART app.
Customer: Install karke fir se wahi hai.
Executive: Install kar liya aapne sab kuch kar liya?
Customer: Sab kuch kar liya.
Executive: Ek baar line pe raho aap. Ab aap mobile number batana kya tha ek baar?
Customer: 9055
Executive: Aage 507 hai na?
Customer: 9055010507
Executive: Screenshot bhejna ek baar mai line pe hi hu screenshot bhejna kya aa raha hai. Side me jane ke baad kya screenshot bhejo kya aa raha hai dikhana. Mai kispe bhejunga ye screenshot?
Customer: Mere WhatsApp bhejo na maine hi likha aapko.
Executive: Ek minute mai bhejta hu.
Customer: Aaya aapke paas?
Executive: Ye aapka jo aa raha hai error connection time out aa raha hai.
Customer: Wahi hai na ye sirf IndiaMART me aa raha hai baki kisi me nahi aa raha.
Executive: Aap suno meri baat pehle.
Customer: Jab IndiaMART app open karte hai na wo open hota hai. Jo niche buyleads hai na?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Buyleads pe jab click karte hai to yahi page open hota hai bas.
Executive: Refresh karna page ko?
Customer: Wo refresh maine yaar subah se 1000 baar kiya hai. Nahi ho raha hai. Same yahi yahi condition hai ek hafte se khali mere ko hi nahi balki do char jan ko hai.
Executive: Iska matlab ye hai ki IndiaMART me kuch fault hai.
Customer: Ye complaint mere paas agar hota na mere paas line lagati calling ki cliento ki. Mere ho sakta hai ki ho sakta hai aapke paas aa raha hai ye mai dikhwata hu aapko error jo error aa raha hai na. Dekho dekho mai aapko batata hu agar mere ko hi khali agar mere ko hi khali hota na to parso mere ko ek bande ne call kiya wo mera friend hai. Uska bhi IndiaMART pe hi hai to usne mere ko bola ki aap zara apna ye IndiaMART open karo kya aapko ye open ho raha hai? Mere ko bhi same problem thi. Maine usko bataya ye shayad waha se hi hoga maine socha ek do ghante ke liye mat hoga to chalta hai magar ek hafta ho gaya abhi.
Executive: Hona bhi nahi chahiye na ek ko bhi nahi hona chahiye ek ko bhi kyu ho raha hai wo dekhna bahut zaruri hai janna. Aur ye ye ho gaye do aur uske baad mera bhai aa gaya.
Customer: Muzaffar ji.
Executive: To Muzaffar ji ko bhi same problem hai.
Customer: Baki kahi par aisa complaint aaya hi nahi hai.
Executive: Dekho abhi maine teen hi ka matlab teen jagah maine dekha agar mai ab cousins ko bolunga to unko bhi shayad hoga. Mai ye nahi keh sakta hoga. Mai shayad keh raha hu magar mere me ye problem nahi honi chahiye kyuki kyuki dekho mai ke alawa buyleads ke alawa kisi aur tab me jana aap.
Executive: Accha mai jata hu lead manager me thik hai. Ha ab kisi aur tab me jao aap ha lead manager me jao. Dekho lead manager me ja raha hu mai.
Customer: Dekho add products me mai gaya to jaldi nikal aaya. Lead manager wala sahi chal raha hai. Ab buyleads pe click karna wapis.
Executive: Accha mujhe ek baat batao. Isme kya rakhna hai lead manager me nikal raha hai waha se app se ek minute ek minute ek minute.
Customer: Lead manager bhi open nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: SCL ka call aa raha hai SCL ka call aa raha hai.
Customer: Ab ab kya aa raha hai sir?
Executive: Kuch nahi open ho raha hai ye dono cheeze open nahi ho rahi hai abhi. Subah to lead open suno suno meri baat lead manager subah open ho raha tha magar abhi open kuch ye dono nahi ho rahe hai.
Executive: Ab lead manager bhi open nahi ho raha? Nahi ho raha hai.
Customer: Iska bhi screenshot bhej dunga ek baar. Mai kya screenshot isse open hi nahi ho raha hai kuch to mai kya karu? Nahi kya aa raha hai kya aa raha hai kya aa raha hai screen pe
Executive: Ho gayi. Ha screen ab kaisi dikh rahi hai uska screenshot de do. Ek minute mai dikhata hu aapko kya dikh raha hai aap dekhoge dekh lo.
Customer: Pareshan ho gaya yaar.
Executive: Bhejo screenshot ha aa gaya. Dekho. Ye dekho. Ab nikal aaya mai dikhata hu aapko kya kya aa gaya waha se. Same same condition yahi hai ek hafte se. Dekho.
Customer: Dekho mai bolta ki yaha pe network issue hai magar baki cheeze to chal rahi hai.
Executive: Suniye bolo bolo. Ab mai ye bol raha hu agar mai maan lu internet nahi chal raha chal raha hai. Mai manta hu internet yaha pe nahi chalega. Magar mai dusri jagah bhi try kiya waha pe yaha pe to accha chalta hai mai sab kuch matlab chal raha hai thik se. Khali yahi open nahi ho raha hai bas. Baki activity ho rahi hai internet ki.
Customer: Asal internet to thik chal raha hai sab kuch thik chalta hai. Hamara to wifi bhi chal raha hai yaha pe. Chala ke dekho YouTube wagera chala ke dekho Instagram chala ke dekho chal raha hai. Sab sab chal raha hai sab chal raha hai mere bhai sab chal raha hai. IndiaMART nahi chal raha abhi keh rahe ho. Khali yahi nahi chal raha hai bas. Chalo thik hai do 10 15 thoda time do check karwata hu mai. Dekho mai aapko batata hu home page open ho raha hai home page. Thik hai. Home page open ho raha hai. Buylead aur lead manager buylead nahi ho raha aur buylead nahi ho raha open. Buylead open ho hi nahi raha hai. Add products to kar sakte hai. Ye do cheeze open hi nahi ho rahe hai. Thik hai thik hai thik hai. Thik hai mere ko do time do abhi mere ko pata laga hai. Vijay usko tech team pe bhejo kya issue aa raha hai. Thik hai koi baat nahi ok. Thik hai done done.
summary:
Concerns:

- Page not opening in the IndiaMART app.

- Buyleads and lead manager not opening.

- Error connection timeout is coming.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested uninstalling and reinstalling the app.

- Asked to send a screenshot of the error.

- Executive assured to check the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will forward the issue to the tech team.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- app, buyleads, lead manager, error, technical issue
